author: stephenh
msg: Applied patch by Edgar Gonzalez (egg@valhallaproject.com) to output idSql to a log instead of System.out.

author: stephenh
msg: Okay, the previous checkin wasn't what I added...the src/templates dir was included in the templates' paths in the jar, so fall back on the old way that worked.

author: stephenh
msg: Let maven copy the templates into the torque jar.

author: stephenh
msg: Maven automatically puts the torque jar in ${maven.dist.bin.assembly.dir}, so move it to lib instead. Avoids having duplicate torque jars in both the / and /lib dirs in the dist.

author: stephenh
msg: Updated to pass maven pom:validate. Basically moved order of some elements and add a Java Developer role for all of the developers.
